definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: It is sacrilegious to wear shoes inside a mosque.
sentences.chinese: 在回教教堂内穿鞋子是亵渎神圣的。

sentences.english: Many Moslem pilgrims go to Mecca every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年很多回教朝圣者到麦加。

sentences.english: The term for Arabesque is a decorative pattern which is typical of Islamic art.
sentences.chinese: 这个名词指典型回教艺术中的装饰图样。

sentences.english: The Palestinian militant group of Islamic Jihad claimed responsibility of the attack.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒斯坦回教圣战组织承认干下此攻击事件。

sentences.english: The Uighurs are a Turkic-speaking Chinese Muslim minority.
sentences.chinese: 维吾尔人是讲突厥语的中国回教徒少数民族。

sentences.english: Moslems and Jews do not consider pork a clean meat.
sentences.chinese: 回教徒和犹太教徒认为猪肉是不能吃的肉。

sentences.english: Because of this, we also believe that you are the saffron robed Muslim.
sentences.chinese: 因为这点，我们亦相信你是披上僧袍的回教徒。

sentences.english: Today is the first day of Hari Raya Puasa .
sentences.chinese: 今天是回教开斋节的第一天。

definition: sun worship/Zoroastrianism/see also 祆教[Xian1 jiao4]
